resources.string: Player has to guess which letters fits in the word's blanks. Each letter can only be used once. If the player guesses the letter incorrectly, a part of the body will be hanging. The player has a certain amount of guesses before the whole body is hanging meaning the game is over. The player can only have one chance to guess the word in its entirety. If the player incorrectly guess the word, they automatically lose the game. There will be a scoring system to keep track of your game score.
